gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 110, Trail Blazers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Trail Blazers, 110-107. DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Bulls with 28 points, five rebounds and six assists, while Ayo Dosunmu added 23 points and a season-high 10 assists in the victory. Anfernee Simons led all scorers with 30 points, along with nine assists for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Bulls have won back-to-back games as they improve to 34-35 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 19-49.
